General.Name: Jiangsu Boamax Technologies Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Boamax Technologies Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells industrial equipment. It provides general contracting services for the development, design, procurement, and construction of photovoltaic power generation projects; replacement stations for heavy trucks; and integrated energy project to distribute energy, as well as high voltage electrode boilers and heat storage tanks. The company also offers rubber cutting robots, agricultural insurance UAV, and wet process equipment; and precision sheet metal structural parts, air detection equipment, and water treatment equipment. In addition, it engages in the sheet metal business. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Boamax Technologies Group Co.,Ltd. Jiangsu Boamax Technologies Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Suzhou, China.
General.Address: Building N, Zendai Himalaya, Nanjing, China, 210012
